As founder and chief executive officer, Ms. Massy Mehdipour drives Skireâ€™s strategic direction and operations. Massy is an accomplished executive whose personal story and business career have been widely chronicled in the press in recent years. Massy is a visionary who is motivated by innovation and changing the status quo, especially within the construction and facilities industry.

Since graduating with an Electrical Engineering degree from McGill University many years ago, Massy has worked at three companies, two of which she founded. Massyâ€™s career began at Bechtel, where she worked for over a decade climbing the ranks and earning many accolades along the way, including being the first female Bechtel put into the field in construction and being the highest ranking female at the time of her departure. While at Bechtel, Massy managed large-scale projects and operations and maintenance in sectors ranging from oil and gas to technology, and ultimately served as manager of the Microelectronics Business Unit.
